Based on the comic book Hellblazer, DC / Vertigo, Constantine tells the story of irreverent supernatural detective John Constantine (Reeves), who literally goes to hell and back.

He joins skeptical policewoman Angela Dodson (Rachel Weisz, The Jury) to solve the mysterious suicide of her twin sister (also played by Weisz). The investigation leads the pair to a dark world, with evil angels and demons, causing many terrible events in a world parallel to modern Los Angeles.
